3: The two ivory figures clash in mid-air, striking each other with incomprehensible speed.
Just the energy spilled from their attacks has left frightening marks on the surrounding cliffs.
But Luna has the upper hand the whole time, taking the high ground in their duel before knocking the creature to the ground, creating a massive crater.
Huff... Puff...
Although she manages to defeat the Hetero-Creature, Luna has to spend a considerable amount of effort to do so.
How remarkable... Miss Luna is truly second to none.
Silently, Luna looks at her hands. Despite not needing to use her full strength, her opponent's power level far has exceeded what she imagined. And...
(The power from Ascension-Network is weakening...)
But, Miss Luna, your fight has yet to end...
The pale creature rises within the ashes. It fully expands its wings with merely a scratch on its body, creating an oppressive feeling that rivals Luna's.
...Pretty resilient.
A blinding red light converges on the Hetero-Creature's hand, while Luna also raises her hand and releases a ray of crimson laser.
The two rays collide, warp, and expand, almost leveling the depths of this canyon.
Soon, the two beams merge and devour each other. Luna struggles but manages to maintain an edge over the Hetero-Creature, leaving it consumed by the energy blast, fallen to the ground.
What the... How dare he do that to Miss Luna...
What happens to Luna if she's devoured?!
I-I wouldn't know...

2: We have to get to the Polyphage first.

3: Mermaid, you know the path, so lead the way.
How can I walk any faster, all tied up like this? Free my tail at the very least...
Lee sighs and unties the wires on Lamia's lower body.
Oh, lovely! Commandant, you really are a good person.

4: Maybe we should keep her tied up.

3: Enough with this. Start moving.
Oh no no no no—I'll keep my mouth shut!
Lamia looks resigned and sighs, but then she breaks into a wide grin as if recalling something.
Heh... Follow me... It's up ahead!
